## Pipeline.create() method

Constructs a new empty Pipeline instance, supporting chainable method calls.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create(options?: PipelineOptions): Pipeline;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [PipelineOptions](./pipeline.pipelineoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional settings for the pipeline's behavior. |
